szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.game

Class GameShop

  • java.lang.Object
    • szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.game.GameShop

  • public class GameShop
extends java.lang.Object
    A class responsible for any purchases by the player during the game level.

    • Method Detail

      • buyBullet

        public szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.actors.Bullet buyBullet(PlayerToken token)

        Creates a new bullet for the player calling this method.

        Buying a bullet currently subtracts 10 points from the calling players score. If the players current score is too low, no bullet (null) is returned

        Parameters:
        token - the identifier of the player calling this method
        Returns:
        a new Bullet for the caller.

      • repairPipeOfPlayer

        public void repairPipeOfPlayer(PlayerToken token,
                               int byHowMuch)

        Repairs the pipe of a player

        The price of repair depends on how much the pipe should be repaired. Currently all repairs will subtract 5 points for each percentage point of repaired damage.

        If the price of repair is higher than players current score, then nothing is repaired, obviously

        Parameters:
        token - the token (identifier) of the player owning the pipe to be repaired. Must be a token assigned by the game to a player, otherwise no pipe is repaired.
        byHowMuch - the amount of percentage points by which to repair the pipe.
